Access content in various formats and resolutions with ease. Fast and secure downloads for videos you want to save and enjoy offline. Support for a wide range of video sites, ensuring you never miss your favorite content.
To give you the best experience, we need access to your storage. This lets us save downloaded videos directly to your device.
This lets us save images, videos, and other content to your device. We do not access or share your personal files. Your data stays private and secure at all times.

Stay updated with important alerts, new content, and app features. Never miss a message, update, or reminder again. We only send relevant and helpful notifications. No spam-just what you need, when you need it.

1. Information We Collect
• Personal Information: We do not collect personally identifiable information like name, email, or phone number.
• Non-Personal Information: Device details, app usage data, transaction history, analytics.
• Third-Party Services: May include Google AdMob, Firebase Analytics, etc.

2. How We Use Your Information
• Provide and optimize app services
• Improve user experience and fix bugs
• Serve relevant advertisements
• Analyze user behavior to enhance app performance

3. Third-Party Services
• Google AdMob Privacy Policy
• Firebase Analytics Privacy Policy

4. Childrenâ€™s Privacy
Our app is not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect data from children. If you think we did, please contact us.

5. Data Security
We take security measures, but no internet-based service is 100% secure.

6. Your Choices
• Disable ad tracking or limit data collection via device settings
• Opt out of personalized ads via Google settings

7. Changes to This Privacy Policy
This policy may change. Any updates will be posted with a revised effective date.

8. Contact Us
If you have any questions, feel free to contact us.

By using our app, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy.
